group_1.textRight: *Sob*...*Sniffle*...*Hic*...@Sakuyaaaaa...!
I've been wantin' to see you again for so long...
A-and...and see, about back then...*hic*@I-I'm so, so sorry I couldn't save you...

group_1.textLeft: Don't cry, Urara.
I still appreciate it, you know?@The important thing is you made it out safe.

group_1.textRight: Zaguyaaaa...

group_1.textLeft: Aww, c'mon, it's okay! This is why it was@so hard for me to come out.

group_1.textRight: Sakuya...

group_1.textLeft: Whoops, let's hit pause on our reunion for now!@It's gonna get out of hand.

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah, you got a lotta explainin' to do.
...Why did you not come out until now...?

group_1.textLeft: Well... This kinda thing is awkward...
But I also couldn't come here any earlier.
You heard that the ghosts who forgave you@are off somewhere else, right?

group_1.textRight: Yes...

group_1.textLeft: It's honestly pretty hard to get here from there.@We've got two choices:
We either need to hate both of you, or you@need to create an atmosphere of forgiveness.

group_1.textRight: Oh, you hate us?

group_1.textLeft: I meant the latter, obviously...

group_1.textRight: Huh...? But if that's the case, you could've met us...

group_1.textLeft: Ack... This is why it was hard for me to leave.@Sorry...
Anyway, I met a girl who offered to be@my guide if I was having trouble.
I gave her instructions through telepathy@on how to usher everyone along.

group_1.textRight: I knew the magic I felt back then@was yours, Sakuya!
And that'd explain why it felt like that girl@was readin' off a script...!
I think I got the gist of it for now.@So what do we do from here?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, that's kinda the thing. It was a really bad@idea for you two to go on a rampage!

group_1.textRight: Ugh... I apologize...@We were unsure of what else to do...

group_1.textLeft: Well, I can understand why you'd get@so freaked out in a situation like that...
I feel like those girls were probably just@trying to get their point across...
But I didn't really get it either,@until I came here.
So their communication also wasn't that great.

group_1.narration: "The dead girls wanted to convey their@hopes for a calm future, while you two@were fighting back hard because you thought@they were gonna kill you."

group_1.textLeft: It seems like you completely overshot each other.

group_1.textRight: Then why couldn't they have just explained@stuff more clearly...?

group_1.textLeft: There wouldn't have been trouble in the first@place if we could all settle things by talking.

group_1.textRight: I...cannot deny that...

group_1.textLeft: That's why we're gonna brute-force it.

group_1.textRight: We've gotta go apeshit again? I don't think@I got enough gas in the tank for that.

group_1.textLeft: No, I mean you and Yuna need to put@the crystals in the lanterns yourselves.
That way, both sides can get their feelings@across better.
Even the things that are hard to face@can be laid out one at a time.
...We've got a ton of crystals stocked up@thanks to you two.

group_1.textRight: ...Hey, speakin' of which... These crystals used to@be flowers that were offered, right?
...Which means that Juri...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, she'd swing by the catacombs to drop@new ones off all the time.

group_1.textRight: Keep your trap shut.
...So we just gotta light the lanterns?

group_1.textLeft: Yep. Here, take these with you.

group_1.textRight: Got 'em. Time to head out.

group_1.textLeft: Juri.

group_1.textRight: What?

group_1.textLeft: Thanks for breaking character to give us@all of those flowers.

group_1.textRight: ...At least I still did it. Don't take the@piss outta Juri the Great like that.

group_1.textLeft: Well, the catacombs are over that way.

group_1.textRight: That way...@But there's nothin' there?

group_1.textLeft: Believe that there is, and go straight ahead.@You'll find them.

group_1.textRight: ...Alright. Understood.

group_1.textLeft: So, Urara, wanna help me fend off the girls@who are going off the rails?

group_1.textRight: You bet!
